title: Animals, Animals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 83 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 320L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     H		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and K
description: Animals, Animals is about some of the fascinating animals in our world. Each page describes interesting facts and brings the world of animals to the reader. Pictures enhance the text. Book and lesson also available at Levels H and K.
reviewWords: camels, elephants, elk, foxes, giraffes, mountains, polar bears, zebras
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Short Vowels                : Identify the short /a/ vowel sound
grammar: Adjectives                : Identify adjectives and the nouns they describe
wordWork: Bold Print                : Understand the use of bold print
